page.title: 07POPULATION 1
page.content: The 1981 census counted 289 residents in the whole Parish, consisting of 143 males and 146 females. The age distribution peaked in the 30-34 age band with 31 people, but above average numbers were found in the 5-19 range and the 25-44 age range. Our 1985 {Housing}Questionaire accounted for 92 residents, about 45% of roughly 200 in the study area. Size of Houshold 1 2 3 4 5 Number of Housholds 3 12 5 10 2 12 new houses have been built since the 1981 census, 6 of these are included in our survey. These 6 have 14 residents of whom 10 are in {employment}and only 2 are children. If typical of all 122 houses this suggests that the village population has increased by about 30 since 1981.
